root: ^Yeah, actually. The Boss gave us a job.
^Ok! But keep it down a little; I don't want Zack to hear.
^It's a request for a propoganda poster.
^Oh! They must have loved my last one!
^They want me to draft it and you to paint it. Not sure why they need me...
^Hey! Your last draft was really inspiring!
^Yes, but we didn't even use it-
^That doesn't matter! They know you're good!
^Yeah, alright. Have to hand this off to Jeff first. I'll come back when the draft's done.
